replies.body:
Let's be honest you're a bot with a bow

I can't give you an actual answer as I've never fought you when you're 100% legit.
If i had to i'd go with you slightly better at pot and me slightly better at iron.
But then what makes you better at pot is your clients so i really don't know.

Cocky, insecure and loud. Trying to compensate something (probably a micro penis). To addicted to hacking and we both know it.
When in the right mood a banterous lad who you can have shit tons of fun with, especially with us both being really competitive and always wanting to be the best. You have improved as a person so much since i first met you and i know feel that you're a good friend. 

Never

I still play MC just much less, I've "moved to CS" for like 3 months now.
Maybe someday if i can be arsed.
on av 9/10
on everything 8/10

You seem like you're nice but seem like you're trying too hard at your personality. Interested in stats and who wins things, so probably quite analytical (which is a good thing). The fact you never seem to talk is annoying and means how far you can go competitively is very limited. Good skill set and understand the game much more than the people on your teams. Seem pretty chill.

replies.body:
Honestly don't know who you are.

MGE

Does cheesecake count?

I get too hooked on things and feel guilty over tons of things. I guess i'm sort of vain because I care about my body, clothes and hair a fair amount. I'm quite confident with my abilities on MC and CS (more so with MC) I'm super proud of my achievements on MC and really happy that I have made some great friends who I will meet one day.

Personality, I'm a nice guy really just very protective of myself and friends. I'm not very good at taking criticism and I'm super stubborn. I also think that I'm pretty friendly if I'm comfortable with you and I'm quite different to the way i present my self on the forums. I'm pretty clever and I like being myself.

Honestly don't know who you are.
